scripts.build:update-data-and-translate: cd data && npx tsx update-data-and-translate.ts && npx prettier --config ../prettier.config.js --write berlinpass_data.json
scripts.build:content: tsx generate-content-and-routes.ts && npx prettier --config prettier.config.js --write src/content/detail-pages-content.ts src/routes/detail-pages-routes.ts
scripts.build:data: tsc --module es6 --skipLibCheck --outDir dist/assets src/routes/detail-pages-routes.ts src/content/detail-pages-content.ts && tsc --module es6 --skipLibCheck --outDir dist/assets src/routes/routes.ts src/content/content.ts
scripts.build: npm run build:content && npm run build:csr && npm run build:data && npm run build:ssr && tsx generate-html.ts
